sentences.sContent: Follow the arrows to the X-ray department.
sentences.sCn: 顺着箭头指示的方向去X光科。

phrases.pCn: 黑箭；投掷影箭；黑箭英国运载火箭

remMethod.val: ar ＋ row (排， 行) → 箭一排排齐发才威力无比 → 箭

trans.tranCn: 箭， 箭状物； 箭头符号
trans.tranOther: a weapon usually made from a thin straight piece of wood with a sharp point at one end, that you shoot with a  bow
